name: cordova-plugin-chrome-webview-checker
description: Checks whether Android System Webview is installed and enabled or not on Cordova.

scripts.testing:setup: cordova create playground org.cpcwc.playground Playground && cd ./playground && cordova platform add android
scripts.testing:reset: cd ./playground && cordova plugin rm cordova-plugin-chrome-webview-checker; cordova plugin add ..

author: Attila Olah <NoNameProvided@users.noreply.github.com>
